purpose.para: If MetaObject is the specialization of meta_namespace, reflecting the global scope, then reflects_global_scope inherits from ::boost::true_type. Otherwise it inherits from ::boost::false_type.

description.para: This template can be used to distinguish whether the opaque MetaObject type reflects the global scope and thus is an instantiation of meta_namespace for the global scope.
